data.title: Wonderful dinner
data.text: We visited on a Friday night and had an enjoyable experience. The food was outstanding. We ordered a filet, lamb chops ,and scallops. All were excellent choices perfectly cooked and presented well. Service was good after a couple of complaints. They didn't seem to know we were there at first but all ended well  staff was very friendly and helpful.  Definitely will return.

data.title: Anniversary Celebration In-Style
data.text: We celebrated our 16th wedding anniversary in Greenville, SC and enjoyed dinner at The Commerce Club where we enjoyed the food, service and atmosphere to the fullest! Thank you Commerce Club for helping to make our special night even more special!

data.title: Open to the Public for SC Restaurant Week Jan 7 - 17, 2016
data.text: The menu for SC Restaurant week was great 3 courses for $30. a real bargain. The view is outstanding and the bar area is lovely to schmooze with friends. The dining room has white table clothes which right away sets a high standard and the servers were great. Our servers were Duke & T.C...The starters were all very good our table had the Crab Cakes, Beet Salad and Brussel Sprouts with Bacon. Everyone enjoyed what they had. The main dishes were Fabulous Pork Tenderloin and Outstanding Tres Major (steak) both came with great vegetables. The desserts were so-so, but I'm not a desert eater and they brought me ice cream which was delightful.  Our drinks were wonderful too.  Not sure what the regular prices are, but for SC Restaurant week I'd hurry up and eat at The Commerce Club while you can.

data.title: Group Company Dinner
data.text: I held an event here for my company and we had a great experience. They were on top of it and very professional. The food was excellent and came out quick. The view was nice but would have been better if we could have seen the sunset. But I only got great feedback and will definitely consider hosting another event here.

data.title: Nice view, but could use some improvements
data.text: The rooms used to host our reunion were not large enough for the crowd that registered. While the food was fresh and tasty, the servers were somewhat "grabby" and pushy. And the bar asked to keep credit cards if we wanted to run a tab and they were stored on the window sill behind the bar table! Archaic method to run tabs, and slow, in this age of technology.

data.title: Won't come back
data.text:
Our company has had four functions at The Commerce Club.  We have been disappointed in our food and service for our events each time.  

Our most recent experience has resulted in our decision to not return to The Commerce Club in the future.

The food was so slow for an awards lunch that people had to leave to return to work who were there as guests of the honoree.  The food was poor at best and the staff was indifferent.

I am not going to throw The Commerce Club under the bus.  I just want people to know that your mileage may vary depending on the type of service and experience you are looking for.

Others have obviously had a different experience.  But over the course of several events, the consistently poor service and food has resulted in this decision.  Perhaps management will turn this around for others.

data.title: Staff is friendly and attentive
data.text: We always stop here when we travel through South Carolina. My favorite is the crab cakes, but anything is going to be served with extreme skill and care. Go when you have time to savor the attention, the views and the atmosphere.

data.title: Great Food and Service a Little Slow for Lunch!
data.text: Great view, very nice atmosphere, quality and service.  Lunch however service is sometimes slow.  Lunch time is an hour when working.  Working in the building barely made it back to the office within the hour!

data.title: Club With Best View in Greenville!
data.text: This is the best place to eat and enjoy the view of downtown Greenville and the mountains! There is no better place to view a sunset in the city of Greenville than here! Service is absolutely superb. Beattie Salad and lobster appetizer were excellent. Wife's tomato bisque and crab cakes were perfect. Chef and GM personally visited our table. Couple dining with us really enjoyed the rack of lamb. This is the best fine dining in Greenville!

data.title: Culinary Heaven
data.text:
This restaurant offers a terrific view of the city but more importantly, the food was fabulous. Each course was executed perfectly. This is undeniably one of the finest dining venues in Greenville.
The service was totally professional. A true dining experience.

data.title: The food and service matches the view
data.text: A great view from the top of One Liberty tower....from different angles you have nice views of the city below and the mountains.  Even better is the food and service and its a great place for business meetings or get togethers. The daily specials are usually truly that....special.  We went to a social to draw new members and we joined on the spot.

data.title: Best view in Greenville and best meal!
data.text: The Commerce Club is a private club and we are members.  It is on the top floor of one of the tallest buildings in Greenville so it has fantastic views of the city and the mountans in the distance.  The views are no the only reason to visit and join the Commerrce Club.  The food is out of this world.  The menu is well thought out so you can have great small plates, entrees and deserts.  One of my favorite appetizers is the Crab Cake.  They call it the Worls Greatest Crabcake and it may just be that it is!  The Salmon is always a favorite as well and the Filet.  On Friday they have Surf & Turf, Lobster and Filet.  And do not miss the bar.  It si vibrant and fun.  Say hello to Ricky while you are there.  Ricky runs the bar and he is very knowledgeable about all alcohol.  We always go to Ricky if we have a question about a wine or if we want to try something new.  He has a great selection of Whiskeys to try and he knows which ones are the best and what they pair with too!  If you have not been to the Commerce Club go, you will not be sorry!

data.title: Check out the Commerce Club
data.text: We were invited to dinner as guests of a member and were very impressed with the food at this lovely club, especially the grouper piccata!  The dining room is very nice, but the bar area has lots of energy and was crowded with people of all ages.  There was a special event happening for young professionals so a large group of them split off to a separate room.  Definitely a good place to meet people in Greenville.

data.title: A wonderful family evening
data.text: We recently joined the CC and took our children for family night.  The staff was incredible.  Friendly and courteous.  They were so welcoming and kind to all our children.  The views and atmosphere were great and the food was fantastic as well.

data.title: Members Only but Membership is World Wide!  Food & Service Excellent
data.text: While you need to be a member, membership includes clubs all over the country.  The food and service are excellent.  The location of the club in Greenville is excellent it is located across from the Hyatt. It is located on the 17th Floor and has an excellent view!
